---
title: "Email"
description: "Send and read emails via SMTP/IMAP"
icon: "envelope"
---

## Overview

Email tool allows you to send emails via SMTP and read emails via IMAP. Supports Gmail, Outlook, and custom SMTP servers.

## Installation

```bash
pip install "praisonai[tools]"
```

## Environment Variables

```bash
# For Gmail
export EMAIL_ADDRESS=your@gmail.com
export EMAIL_PASSWORD=your_app_password
export EMAIL_SMTP_HOST=smtp.gmail.com
export EMAIL_SMTP_PORT=587
export EMAIL_IMAP_HOST=imap.gmail.com
```

## Quick Start

```python
from praisonai_tools import EmailTool

# Initialize
email = EmailTool(provider="gmail")

# Send email
email.send(
    to="recipient@example.com",
    subject="Hello",
    body="Hello from PraisonAI!"
)
```

## Usage with Agent

```python
from praisonaiagents import Agent
from praisonai_tools import EmailTool

agent = Agent(
    name="EmailAssistant",
    instructions="You help send and manage emails.",
    tools=[EmailTool(provider="gmail")]
)

response = agent.chat("Send an email to john@example.com about the meeting tomorrow")
print(response)
```

## Available Methods

### send(to, subject, body, cc=None, bcc=None)

Send an email.

```python
from praisonai_tools import EmailTool

email = EmailTool(provider="gmail")
email.send(
    to="recipient@example.com",
    subject="Meeting Reminder",
    body="Don't forget our meeting at 3pm!",
    cc="manager@example.com"
)
```

### read(folder="INBOX", limit=10)

Read emails from a folder.

```python
emails = email.read(folder="INBOX", limit=5)
```

### search(query, folder="INBOX")

Search emails.

```python
results = email.search("from:boss@company.com", folder="INBOX")
```

## Gmail Setup

1. Enable 2-Factor Authentication
2. Generate App Password at [Google Account](https://myaccount.google.com/apppasswords)
3. Use App Password as `EMAIL_PASSWORD`

## Common Errors

| Error | Cause | Solution |
|-------|-------|----------|
| `Authentication failed` | Wrong credentials | Check email/password |
| `Less secure apps` | Gmail security | Use App Password |
| `Connection refused` | Wrong server | Check SMTP/IMAP host |
